HomeWiki:
Project Description
LEET is a capture-replay tool based on Microsoft’s User Interface Automation Framework. It is targeted at agile teams, and provides support for:

  • automated GUI tests
  • rule-based testing
  • multi-layer test architecture
  • user interface test-driven development (in conjunction with: Active Story Enhanced)

Check out our Demo Videos on YouTube!

For more information about the LEET project, check out our SurfNet Page.

Try out our release candidate and let us know if LEET meets your testing needs - get in touch with tdhellmann through the People page!
